docs.snippet: The lingering theatrical convention of casting Caucasians in roles that call for Asians incites exasperation in Han Ong’s play “Chairs and a Long Table.”...

docs.abstract: Alexis Soloski reviews Ma-Yi Theater Company production of Han Ong play Chairs and a Long Table, directed by Linsay Firman and starring Julienne Hanzelka Kim and Moses Villarama at the Clurman Theater.

headline.seo: ‘Chairs and a Long Table,’ About Slighting Asians Onstage
headline.main: The Places Are Set, but Not for All
